name: Helicopter Rescue
description:
[Tokens: 512, Chars: 1015, Bytes: 1021]

Rescue the little people before they succumb to the raging wildfires!

You have to land on flat land (the peaks or valleys) near the people to collect them.

Drop them off at the starting point to rescue them.

Your helicopter can only carry 4 people at a time so be sure to drop them off at the starting point when you're full. 

Controls: Up, Left, Right to move, X to restart
